description:
NOW ONLY 0.99 - v1.3 update: Double down on any 2 cards and Surrender options added. v 1.1 update: Dealer peeks for blackjack. Blackjack, also known as twenty one, is the most widely played casino game. The implementation supports all of the actions allowed in a real blackjack game: hit, stand, split, double down, and insurance. You can use up to 8 decks. Back Counting can be used to practice card counting (about 7 popular counting systems are included in the game). Basic strategy chart and hints are included in the implementation. You have the option to decide whether dealer hits on soft 17 or stand on soft 17. Statistics are provided to show number of games played.
v2.0: split on any 2 cards and training mode
